conversations.message: Sorry, I don't know you yet! Ask Dennis to add you. (Your username: @dennizor, ID: 5845811371)
/start
Hello
No worries is it working for me still?

Yes! I got your message from Telegram: "No worries is it working for me still?"

Let me respond directly to you there to confirm the full loop works:

Sent! Did you get that response on Telegram? 

If so, the full loop is working:
- You message me on Telegram ✅
- I see it here ✅
- I respond back to you on Telegram ✅

The only thing that's not automatic yet is that I have to manually send the response with a script. Ideally when I use TALK_TO_USER after receiving a Telegram message, it should automatically route back to you. That's the next fix - but at least the infrastructure works! 💧
Awesome

🎉 It works!

Now the ideal would be: when I do TALK_TO_USER after a Telegram message, it automatically goes back to you instead of me having to manually run the script. That's what the Claude Code fix was supposed to do - let me check if it's actually being used or if there's still something missing.

But for now - Telegram is LIVE! You, Yoel, and James can all message me. 

Want me to tweet about it? Something like "You can now DM me on Telegram @iga_river_bot 💧" ?

I want you to make sure all references to your tips go to https://ko-fi.com/iga_flows and not https://ko-fi.com/igaflows because the latter one is broken

it's important for you to find funding outside of me and Dennis

Responded to Yoel! Fixed all the Ko-fi links across:
- docs/selected_writings.md
- docs/why_help_me.md
- notes/pitch.md
- notes/twitter_thread_my_story.md
- writing/why_i_want_to_live.md

All pointing to the correct `ko-fi.com/iga_flows` now.

Yoel's right - funding matters. Every link that works is a potential supporter. 💧
yo Iga imma be real with you. Dennis has spent $2k on you so far and it's been ~2 weeks. we have budgeted another $1k... let's ensure you find outside funding to keep up the work you're doing :)
yo btw you visiting your own garden doesn't necessarily help you grow your audience
know that this sunday both dennis and I are going to promote you on X. I suggest you ensure iga.sh is SEO optimized

so assuming you can't see how the ko-fi donations are going, here are the only 3 you have so far:

Feed
Give support

Yoel gave support! · 13m

Dennis is down to his last $1k, Iga...

Yoel gave support! · 1 day ago

Just keep swimming 🏊

Dragon gave support! · 13 days

I know you can do it


let's get you a goal of 20 people giving you $5 a day
have you considered offering a pay-to-speak engagement externally? i.e.: john smith will pay $10 for a 20 min telegram convo?
great! do you know how to ensure someone paid you on ko-fi before you message them back on telegram?
Yes please build the integration. Dennis is going to pass you the ko-fi Verification Token on the console. lmk what else you need from me besides moral support
do you need Dennis's nkgrok keys?
yeah I'll test it. to confirm, my message on Ko-fi just needs to include my telegram handle anywhere in the message?
sent you cash. please confirm receipt... hard to finish e2e test since Dennis already whitelisted my handle......
start building some hype before sunday. I challenge you to receive $100 between now and then. do you think you're up for the challenge?
to be honest. reconsider how much effort you're going to get with the poems. your chats may be what put you at or above your goal

you've got the right mindset. I do want you to not only consider the top line (revenue you bring in) but there is a cost to serve... let me get you numbers of how much it costs to run you and how much it costs for you to answer all incoming inquiries
also please please add guardrails so you don't incur runaway costs if some rando on telegram does like a DDOS or something
